Dialogues.Text: Mind explaining what exactly you're doing here?
Just a small group keeping an eye on things. Not sure if its any of your business though.
Don't get any ideas. Not just anyone is allowed into our order... Especially not those who snoop around where they shouldnt't.
What?! No, nothing of the sort. Don't know what would give you that idea...
Just exploring, huh? Why's exploring involve snooping around abandoned buildings?
Hmm, okay. That seems fair enough. Just don't go snooping around where you don't belong, alright?
Well, we wouldn't want anything bad happening to you now would we? You never know who roams these parts. Being all alone in a dilapitaed cabin? Sounds like a recipe for disaster if you ask me.
Well, you seem to be just fine. You're free to go.
